mapper.select: select id, consume_time from mry_customer_pro_item where is_deleted = 0 and shop_id = #{shopId} and customer_id = #{customerId} and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(consume_time,'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(consume_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
